item.title: 发表文献

Multi-channel Narrow-Band Deep Speech Separation with Full-band Permutation Invariant Training. arXiv preprint arXiv:2110.05966 (2021). [例子和介绍] [code] [pdf] [3] Changsheng Quan and Ping Guo. 2021. A local search method based on edge age strategy for minimum vertex cover problem in massive graphs. Expert Systems with Applications 182, (November 2021), 115185. DOI:https://doi.org/10.1016/j.eswa.2021.115185 [code] 2019 [2] Ping Guo, Changsheng Quan, and Haizhu Chen. 2019. MEAMVC: A Membrane Evolutionary Algorithm for Solving Minimum Vertex Cover Problem.

item.title: 关于我
item.description: 个人资料 我是西湖大学和浙江大学联合培养博士研究生，我的导师是 李晓飞教授 。我目前还是 西湖大学音频实验室 的一名成员。 研究兴趣 我的研究兴趣主要包括机器学习和声音信号处理，具体包括语音分离、语音降噪、语音识别。 更多 Github, Google Scholar
